name: Zenbase AI
long_description:
Zenbase AI automates prompt engineering for production environments. Instead of manually crafting prompts, developers can integrate Zenbase AIâ€™s open-source SDK to streamline and optimize their AI workflows. Imagine working on an AI project where the prompt engineering process is automated, reducing your workload and improving efficiency.

Zenbase AI is transforming how developers ship with AI by providing automated prompt engineering and continuous quality optimization. Zenbase AI enables you to create better user experiences faster, focusing on programming rather than prompting. With Zenbase AI, you can drive better outcomes and save dozens of hours.

Cyrus Nouroozi and Amir Mehr have been friends for a long time and have been doing consulting together. Both are key contributors to StanfordNLP's DSPy project. Through their consulting work, they identified a common pain point: prompt iteration was time-consuming with uncertain ROI. Realizing the potential for automation, they created Zenbase. By automating prompt engineering, Zenbase significantly reduces the time and effort required, allowing developers to deploy AI models faster and with better performance.

Zenbase, being open-source, empowers a wide range of developers and companies to enhance their AI capabilities efficiently. With its innovative approach and focus on automation, Zenbase is poised to revolutionize AI prompt engineering and optimize AI workflows across various industries.
